Classes/EncodedData.html#/s:14StickyEnco.name: byteCount
Classes/EncodedData.html#/s:14StickyEnco.abstract: Returns the count of bytes required to store the value in binary form.

Classes/EncodedData.html#/s:14StickyEnco.abstract: Write the binary representation of the value to buffer.

Classes/BinaryDecoder.html#/s:14StickyEn.name: init(userInfo:)
Classes/BinaryDecoder.html#/s:14StickyEn.abstract: Initializes an instance of the decoder optionally passing context information for the decoding process.

Classes/BinaryDecoder.html#/s:14StickyEn.name: decode(_:from:)
Classes/BinaryDecoder.html#/s:14StickyEn.abstract: Decodes a top-level value of the given type T from the Binary representation data.

Classes/BinaryDecoder.html#/s:14StickyEn.name: userInfo
Classes/BinaryDecoder.html#/s:14StickyEn.abstract: Any contextual information set by the user for decoding.

Classes/BinaryEncoder.html#/s:14StickyEn.name: init(userInfo:)
Classes/BinaryEncoder.html#/s:14StickyEn.abstract: Initializes an instance of the encoder optionally passing context information for the encoding process.

Classes/BinaryEncoder.html#/s:14StickyEn.name: encode(_:)
Classes/BinaryEncoder.html#/s:14StickyEn.abstract: Encodes the given top-level value and returns its Binary representation.

Classes/BinaryEncoder.html#/s:14StickyEn.name: userInfo
Classes/BinaryEncoder.html#/s:14StickyEn.abstract: Any contextual information set by the user for encoding.

Classes/BinaryDecoder.html.name: BinaryDecoder
Classes/BinaryDecoder.html.abstract: BinaryDecoder facilitates the decoding of binary values into semantic Decodable types.
